text: @Acosta Trump says he met two people with Coronavirus?    Haven’t we learned our lesson Trump lies at everything.  We don’t know these two people he talks about? where were they tested and by whom?.  It’s all hear say with Trump and his imaginary world.  @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump
